page.title: 13Spare time activities
page.content:
In my spare time I clean the house and do the dishes and if I still have a lot of time I go to the swimming baths. Sometimes I watch television or take my sisters out to play. We might play in the back garden, on the swings or go to the park. Sometimes my brother lends me his bike and then my friends get theirs. We can ride to the van (a mobile shop) where we can buy sweets or we ride round the houses and squares. Most times we play up and down the street. At 8 o'clock I go indoors to watch television and I go to bed at about 11 o'clock. I am very happy. Lesley Miller
{Participating Schools in this sector:} Croxteth CPJM (Liverpool) Nine Trees CPJM (Knowsley) Mab Lane (Formerly Cantril Farm) CPJM (Liverpool) - co-ordinators.
